attributes.action: create a national database of everyone's DNA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am not a criminal. I have no intention of breaking the law. I also place a large amount of trust in the criminal justice system. Due to these things I am happy to give up my DNA.

Having a national database of DNA will drastically improve conviction rates, particularly for serious crimes. Criminals are leeches on a civilised society and it is our duty to help the police catch them.
